channel.title: Chrome on Home on Rails
channel.description: Recent content in Chrome on Home on Rails

item.title: 5 New Tab Google Chrome extensions for productivity freaks
item.description: 1. Mortality “Mortality is a new tab extension that reminds you of your precise age. A bitter-sweet motivational tool; it illustrates how little time we have. Circles represent months, for the average lifespan of 80 years. As you age, the circles fill, and are split into the main Chapters of your life.” My current one. Highly motivating. https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/mortality-new-tab/eeedcpdcehnikgkhbobmkjcipjhlbmpn 2. Motivation If Mortality is too much for you, try this small extension.
